JuliaWebAPI.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    JuliaWebAPI.APIInvoker — Type.

    APIInvoker holds the transport and format used for a remote api call.

    JuliaWebAPI.APIResponder — Type.

    APIResponder holds the transport and format used for data exchange and the endpoint specifications.

    JuliaWebAPI.APISpec
    JuliaWebAPI.AbstractAPIInvoker
    JuliaWebAPI.AbstractAPIResponder
    JuliaWebAPI.AbstractMsgFormat
    JuliaWebAPI.AbstractTransport
    JuliaWebAPI.CONTROL_CMDS
    JuliaWebAPI.CRLFCRLF
    JuliaWebAPI.DictMsgFormat — Type.

    Intermediate format that is just a Dict. No serialization. A Dict with cmd (string), args (array), vargs (dict).

    JuliaWebAPI.ERR_CODES
    JuliaWebAPI.EndPts
    JuliaWebAPI.HttpRpcServer
    JuliaWebAPI.InProcChannels
    JuliaWebAPI.InProcTransport — Type.

    Transport layer over in-process Channels

    JuliaWebAPI.JSONMsgFormat — Type.

    Intermediate format based on JSON. A JSON object with cmd (string), args (array), vargs (dict).

    JuliaWebAPI.JuliaWebAPI
    JuliaWebAPI.LFLF — Constant.

    Handles multipart form data. Transfers all content as String. Binary files can be uplaoded by encoding them with base64 first.

    JuliaWebAPI.SerializedMsgFormat — Type.

    Intermediate format based on Julia serialization. A dict with cmd (string), args (array), vargs (dict).

    JuliaWebAPI.ZMQTransport — Type.

    Transport layer over ZMQ sockets

    JuliaWebAPI._dict_dser

    JuliaWebAPI._dict_httpresponse
    JuliaWebAPI._dict_ser
    JuliaWebAPI.apicall — Function.

    Calls a remote api cmd with args... and data.... The response is formatted as specified by the formatter specified in conn.

    JuliaWebAPI.args
    JuliaWebAPI.call_api — Function.

    call the actual API method, and send the return value back as response

    JuliaWebAPI.fnresponse — Function.

    extract and return the response data as a direct function call would have returned but throw error if the call was not successful.
